## bsLT variable

[binarySearch](./arrays.binarysearch.md) result index classifier for predecessor queries. Returns index of last item less than search value or -1 if no such values exist.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bsLT: (i: number) => number
```

## Example


```ts
bsLT(binarySearch([10, 20, 30, 40], 25))
// 1

```
